mapper.select: /** * Query ID : restore_nmCheck * Description : 복구명 중복 체크 * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT COUNT(A.RESTORE_NM) FROM ( SELECT RESTORE_NM FROM T_RMAN_RESTORE UNION ALL SELECT RESTORE_NM FROM T_DUMP_RESTORE )A WHERE RESTORE_NM = #{restore_nm}
/** * Query ID : latestRestoreSN * Description : 최근SN 조회 * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RESTORE_SN),0) AS restore_sn FROM T_RMAN_RESTORE
